mapper.insert: insert into warehouse (id, detailed_Warehousing_id, stock_number, warehouse_address, phone, create_user_id, create_time, sku_id,batch) values (default, #{detailedWarehousingId}, #{stockNumber}, #{warehouseAddress}, #{phone}, #{createUserId}, now(), #{skuId},#{batch});
mapper.select:
select w.id as w_id, w.detailed_Warehousing_id as w_detailed_Warehousing_id, sum(w.stock_number) as w_stock_number, w.warehouse_address as w_warehouse_address, w.phone as w_phone, w.create_user_id as w_create_user_id, w.create_time as w_create_time, w.user_renew_id as w_user_renew_id, w.renew_time as w_renew_time, w.sku_id as w_sku_id, w.batch as w_batch,
dw.id as dw_id, dw.warehousing_id as dw_warehousing_id, dw.vendor_id as dw_vendor_id, dw.sku_id as dw_sku_id, dw.batch as dw_batch, dw.purchase_price as dw_purchase_price, dw.number as dw_number, dw.status as dw_status, dw.logic_del as dw_logic_del, dw.create_user_id as dw_create_user_id, dw.create_time as dw_create_time, dw.user_renew_id as dw_user_renew_id, dw.renew_time as dw_renew_time,
gs.id as gs_id, gs.spu_id as gs_spu_id, gs.sku_name as gs_sku_name, gs.sku_desc as gs_sku_desc, gs.color_id as gs_color_id, gs.price_id as gs_price_id, gs.Stock_id as gs_Stock_id, gs.sales_volume as gs_sales_volume, gs.company_id as gs_company_id, gs.manufacturer as gs_manufacturer, gs.Supplier_id as gs_Supplier_id, gs.create_user_id as gs_create_user_id, gs.create_time as gs_create_time, gs.user_renewId as gs_user_renewId, gs.renew_time as gs_renew_time, gs.logic_status as gs_logic_status,
v.id as v_id, v.vendor_name as v_vendor_name, v.sku_id as v_sku_id, v.vendor_address as v_vendor_address, v.`desc` as v_desc, v.principal as v_principal, v.tel as v_tel, v.create_user_id as v_create_user_id, v.create_time as v_create_time, v.user_renew_id as v_user_renew_id, v.renew_time as v_renew_time, v.purchase_time as v_purchase_time,
w2.id as w2_id, w2.purchase_id as w2_purchase_id, w2.detailed_purchase_id as w2_detailed_purchase_id, w2.examine_user_id as w2_examine_user_id, w2.examine_time as w2_examine_time, w2.Warehousing_user_id as w2_Warehousing_user_id, w2.Warehousing_time as w2_Warehousing_time, w2.Warehousing_number as w2_Warehousing_number, w2.status as w2_status, w2.create_user_id as w2_create_user_id, w2.create_time as w2_create_time, w2.user_renew_id as w2_user_renew_id, w2.renew_time as w2_renew_time, w2.signing_details as w2_signing_details, w2.inventory_details as w2_inventory_details,
e.id as e_id, e.role_id as e_role_id, e.username as e_username, e.password as e_password, e.address as e_address, e.phone as e_phone, e.create_user_id as e_create_user_id, e.create_time as e_create_time, e.user_renew_id as e_user_renew_id, e.renew_time as e_renew_time,
w3.id as w3_id, w3.role_id as w3_role_id, w3.username as w3_username, w3.password as w3_password, w3.address as w3_address, w3.phone as w3_phone, w3.create_user_id as w3_create_user_id, w3.create_time as w3_create_time, w3.user_renew_id as w3_user_renew_id, w3.renew_time as w3_renew_time,
cu.id as cu_id, cu.role_id as cu_role_id, cu.username as cu_username, cu.password as cu_password, cu.address as cu_address, cu.phone as cu_phone, cu.create_user_id as cu_create_user_id, cu.create_time as cu_create_time, cu.user_renew_id as cu_user_renew_id, cu.renew_time as cu_renew_time,
c.id as c_id, c.color_name as c_color_name, c.create_user_id as c_create_user_id, c.create_time as c_create_time, c.user_renew_id as c_user_renew_id, c.renew_time as c_renew_time from warehouse w left join user cu on cu.id = w.create_user_id left join detailed_warehousing dw on w.detailed_Warehousing_id = dw.id left join vendor v on dw.vendor_id = v.id
left join warehousing w2 on dw.warehousing_id = w2.id left join user e on w2.examine_user_id = e.id left join user w3 on w2.Warehousing_user_id = w3.id
left join goodsku gs on w.sku_id = gs.id left join color c on gs.color_id = c.id GROUP BY w.sku_id

select w.id as w_id, w.detailed_Warehousing_id as w_detailed_Warehousing_id, w.stock_number as w_stock_number, w.warehouse_address as w_warehouse_address, w.phone as w_phone, w.create_user_id as w_create_user_id, w.create_time as w_create_time, w.user_renew_id as w_user_renew_id, w.renew_time as w_renew_time, w.sku_id as w_sku_id, w.batch as w_batch,
dw.id as dw_id, dw.warehousing_id as dw_warehousing_id, dw.vendor_id as dw_vendor_id, dw.sku_id as dw_sku_id, dw.batch as dw_batch, dw.purchase_price as dw_purchase_price, dw.number as dw_number, dw.status as dw_status, dw.logic_del as dw_logic_del, dw.create_user_id as dw_create_user_id, dw.create_time as dw_create_time, dw.user_renew_id as dw_user_renew_id, dw.renew_time as dw_renew_time,
gs.id as gs_id, gs.spu_id as gs_spu_id, gs.sku_name as gs_sku_name, gs.sku_desc as gs_sku_desc, gs.color_id as gs_color_id, gs.price_id as gs_price_id, gs.Stock_id as gs_Stock_id, gs.sales_volume as gs_sales_volume, gs.company_id as gs_company_id, gs.manufacturer as gs_manufacturer, gs.Supplier_id as gs_Supplier_id, gs.create_user_id as gs_create_user_id, gs.create_time as gs_create_time, gs.user_renewId as gs_user_renewId, gs.renew_time as gs_renew_time, gs.logic_status as gs_logic_status,
v.id as v_id, v.vendor_name as v_vendor_name, v.sku_id as v_sku_id, v.vendor_address as v_vendor_address, v.`desc` as v_desc, v.principal as v_principal, v.tel as v_tel, v.create_user_id as v_create_user_id, v.create_time as v_create_time, v.user_renew_id as v_user_renew_id, v.renew_time as v_renew_time, v.purchase_time as v_purchase_time,
w2.id as w2_id, w2.purchase_id as w2_purchase_id, w2.detailed_purchase_id as w2_detailed_purchase_id, w2.examine_user_id as w2_examine_user_id, w2.examine_time as w2_examine_time, w2.Warehousing_user_id as w2_Warehousing_user_id, w2.Warehousing_time as w2_Warehousing_time, w2.Warehousing_number as w2_Warehousing_number, w2.status as w2_status, w2.create_user_id as w2_create_user_id, w2.create_time as w2_create_time, w2.user_renew_id as w2_user_renew_id, w2.renew_time as w2_renew_time, w2.signing_details as w2_signing_details, w2.inventory_details as w2_inventory_details,
e.id as e_id, e.role_id as e_role_id, e.username as e_username, e.password as e_password, e.address as e_address, e.phone as e_phone, e.create_user_id as e_create_user_id, e.create_time as e_create_time, e.user_renew_id as e_user_renew_id, e.renew_time as e_renew_time,
w3.id as w3_id, w3.role_id as w3_role_id, w3.username as w3_username, w3.password as w3_password, w3.address as w3_address, w3.phone as w3_phone, w3.create_user_id as w3_create_user_id, w3.create_time as w3_create_time, w3.user_renew_id as w3_user_renew_id, w3.renew_time as w3_renew_time,
cu.id as cu_id, cu.role_id as cu_role_id, cu.username as cu_username, cu.password as cu_password, cu.address as cu_address, cu.phone as cu_phone, cu.create_user_id as cu_create_user_id, cu.create_time as cu_create_time, cu.user_renew_id as cu_user_renew_id, cu.renew_time as cu_renew_time,
c.id as c_id, c.color_name as c_color_name, c.create_user_id as c_create_user_id, c.create_time as c_create_time, c.user_renew_id as c_user_renew_id, c.renew_time as c_renew_time from warehouse w left join user cu on cu.id = w.create_user_id left join detailed_warehousing dw on w.detailed_Warehousing_id = dw.id left join vendor v on dw.vendor_id = v.id
left join warehousing w2 on dw.warehousing_id = w2.id left join user e on w2.examine_user_id = e.id left join user w3 on w2.Warehousing_user_id = w3.id
left join goodsku gs on w.sku_id = gs.id left join color c on gs.color_id = c.id where w.sku_id = #{skuId}
